title: config a project to use Vite

project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up Vite for?

includeLib.description: Add a library build option and skip the server option.

includeVitest.description: Use vitest for the test suite.

uiFramework.description: UI Framework to use for Vite.
uiFramework.x-prompt: What UI framework plugin should Vite use?

buildTarget.description: The build target of the project to be transformed to use the @longstupay/vue-nx-boot:build executor.

serveTarget.description: The serve target of the project to be transformed to use the @longstupay/vue-nx-boot:dev-server and @longstupay/vite:preview-server executors.

testTarget.description: The test target of the project to be transformed to use the @longstupay/vue-nx-boot:test executor.
